# init(projecting:)

**Initializer**

Initializes this pose as the 2D projection of the given pose on the XZ plane

## Declaration

```swift
init(projecting pose3D: Pose3D)
```

## Creating 2D pose objects

- **init()**
- **init(position:rotation:)**
